div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem x ixo die mensis
Septembris anno Dominj quo supra

The saide day sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht one that ane part Ande Copin hill
and Johne of mar' his forspekar and procurator one that vthir part oblist tham be the fathtis of thar bodiis that thai sale comper
befor the aldirman and ballieis of this burghe one monunday that next cumis
within the tolbutht befor novne in the court and thar' abid' ande stande at the finale
deliuerance decret and ordinance of the personis chosin suorne and passit obefor
one ane assis' anent the wranguis' labouring manuring and occupeing of ane
croft pertening to the said' copin' ande follouit be him and his said' forspekar one the saide
knicht be ane borghe' fundin in the handis of William scrimgeor officiar' et cetera Ande gif
ony of the personis forsaid' contenit in the act maide obefor be salit vteuthe the burghe'
or may nocht be comprehendit the aldirman and balyeis sale ger' cheis' vthiris personis
lest vnsuspect tile ony vthir and pas' one the saide assis' and deliuere In the said' matir

The said' day William ailhous' skynnere oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to pay
to Duncan Andirsone tua stane of woll within xv dais next hereftir

The said' day the aldirman balyeis Counsale and diuers' of the Communite present for
the tyme grantit ande gef to sere thomas lammyntone chapellane Sanct
Clementis chapele for ale the dais of his lyve with ale offeringis Obuentis proventis
toftis croftis and fredomes pertening or may pertene tharto quhilkis was vacand'
and at thar' disposicioun' sene the deces' of vmquhile ser Ingerame bannerman'
possessor of the samyn

add.foreign: Introitus Johannes ruthirfurd' per thomam Waus balliuum

div.p:
The said' day sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht Comperit befor the aldirman and
balyeis at the charge and commavnde of thomas Waus ane of the balyeis of the said'
burghe and offerit him redy tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Copin
hile and Johne of mar' in his nayme as law wald' And the said' balye
allegit and schew that he hed' done to his office It that efferit to him of law
considiring he hed' entirit the said' knicht offering him redy tile vndirlie the law
In the said' matir

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die mensis
Septembris anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene duodecimo die mensis septembris anno Dominj Millesimo
quingentesimo quinto Coram honorabilibus viris Johanne leslie preoposito Thoma leslie thoma
Waus et patricio leslie tribus balliuorum dicti burgi in pretorio eiusdem protribunali
sedens per subscriptum videlicet Andream Cullane Johannem mar' Johannem Ratre Andream
murray Dauid blinsele matheum branche Duncanum Colisone patricium rede Johannem
Malisone Dauid murray Johanem Kintor Jacobum Keminty et thomam gledstane
burgenses dicti burgi Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Dauid gledstane pater margarete
gledstane latricis presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et
fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Nauium ex
orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Johannis chamer ex boreali ex vna et torrentem
sancte trinitatis ex australi partibus ab altera et terram quondam Jacobi Kintor versus oriens
et communionem venellam versus occidens Et quod dicta margareta est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus
heredibus dicti quondam Dauid patris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta
terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum vigintj s' Et valuit xiij s' et iiijor d' Et quod tenetur
in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus
domini nostri Regis legittime per seipsum ob decessum dicti quondam Dauid patris suj per dimidium
vnius annj aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus suum hucusque vnum prosequentis
datis et clausis sub Sigillo dicti ballivi et sigillis quorundum quj hinc Inqui
sicionj Intererant faciendum anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis tile
Androw murray to bring his charteris and lettres of Sesin quhilkis he has of alexander
bannerman of Wattirton' of ane annuele Rent of vj merkis and thareftir thai sald'
do it that our Souerane lordis lettres commandit thame according tharto

Eodem die frater Richardus murray fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Robertum murray
suum virum legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem dans et concedens eidem suam libram presentatem et mandatum
Speciale pro se et nomine suo ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum omnia et Singula bona
sibi Jure hereditario contingenti per decessum quondam Andree murray patris suj a quibuscumque
personis et de Receptis acquietandum prosequendum Agendum defendendum Ceteram omnia
alia et Singula faciendum et excercendum In primisse et que de Jure aut
Consuetudine pertinere dinoscuntur promittens de Rato et grato Cum ceteris
terminis et clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die Anabella Cullane filia quondam Robertj Cullane burgensis huius burgi
fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordinauit Andream Cullane patricium suum et
Johannem mar' auunculum suum coniunctim et diuisim suos veros legittimos et Indubitatos Curatos
dantes et concedentes eisdem ac eorum aliter suam liberam Integram ac omnimodam
potestatem et mandatum speciale se et terras suos annuos Redditus ac bona sua
vniuersas mobilia et Immobilia Regendum educandum gubernandum et defendendum
pro suis commodo per vtilitate donet presentauit ad perfectam etatem secundum leges Regnj
Acta et consuetudines et cetera Inquisicione presens precedens per conburgenses probiores eiusdem burgi
quod dicta Annabella annos districionis habuit ad eligendum sibj curatam

Eodem die marioria fathe sponsa Robertj glenmaluyn conuicta fuit per assisam
iuratam ex ore Johannis mar prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Elizabetht blinsele
Cuj emendabit in Jura volunt et dicta Elizabetht conuicta fuit de perturbio
prefate mariorie Insuper dicta assisa continuabant et referebant emendam
dicti perturbij proposito et consilio in fora die lune inueniente sequente

The said' day margaret gledstane douchtir and ane of the ayris of vmquhile
Dauy gledstane and patrik leslie ane of the balyeis of the said' burghe oblist
tham be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar handis vphaldin to abid' and Reman
at the deliuerance decret and ordinance of the personis nemmyt betuix Jhon'
of mar' and Alexander arduchry ande do siclik gentrice and profit to the saide Johne
as thai ordane the saide Alexander to do for his sone

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne of mar' forspekar
that Richerd' Rugy Skippar sale refunde and pay tile Androw Cullane for
tua hundretht futuale tua hundretht lenterinvair' and j quartar of hundretht same
kale as vthiris gudis was Sellit in the mercat of
Ande samekile as the said' Skippar cane preiwe the saide skinnis was skathit
eftir thai come in Danskin Johne Wilyongsone sale Recompens' the said
Skippar

The saide day Johne horne come Souerte and grantit to pay tile Anny
andirsone the Relict of vmquhile Richerd' Waus xij s' and vij d' within
terme of law for Johne thomsone Ande the saide Johne thomsone
grantit to releiwe and freithe the said' Johne horne of the saide mo
ney

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pre
torio eiusdem decimo quinto die mensis Septembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes cullane Alexander Reid' Andreas cullane Jaco
bus colisone Dauid mar gavinus murray matheus branch' Johannes
mar' amerciantur in defectu presencie quia Citatj fuerunt ad assisam
inter Johannem Rutherfurd' militem ex vna et J Copine hill partibus ab
altera

The said day sere Johnne Ruthirfurd' knicht offerit him Redy to do
ale that accordit him in the accioune follouit be copin hill Anent
the wranguis' lauboring of ane croft as was allegit eftir
the tenour' of the act' maid tharapoune Of befor et cetera

The said day Johnne of mar forspekar' for copin hill requirit the
bailyes that thai wauld' caus the personis beand present that pas'
one the assis' Of befor anent the accioune debatabill betuix
him and schir Johnne Ruthirfurd' anent the lauboring of ane
croft et cetera And vtheris personis to be chosin witht thame to be suorn'
and pas to the desecioune of the borgh' fundin one the said
knicht be the said Johnne of mar the said knicht disassentit
tharto sayand' he wauld' he hald' him at the act' maid thar
upoune Of befor And the bailyes offerit thame to do Justice to
baitht the said partiis and to put the said matir to the desicion'
of ane assis' and' the partiis wauld consent tharto

The said day Richerd Rugy grauntit him content and pait of
ale thingis contenit in the chartir party maid betuix him and Johnne' crag
and carolus stevinsoun' And dyschargis and quietclamis thame now and
for euyr' as eftir followis Thir Indentouris maid at leith the xxij
day of Aprile the yeir of god jM vC ande fiwe yeris proportis contenis
ande beris witnes that it is appontit ande accordit betuix worthi men
Charlis stevinsone and Johne of crag burges of Abirdene one the ta part
And Dauid nicholsone Johne gordoun and Richard Rugy pertioris ande
awneris of ane schipe callit the gabriel one the tothir part In maner form'
and effect as eftir follouis that Is to say that the saide Dauid Johnne
and Richard' has sauld' to the saide charlis stevinsoun' and Johnne
crag sextene mowy of gret Salt of the mesour of franch' to be deliuerit
fre apone the key of Abirdene In als possible haste als soun' and wind'
ande weddir seruice / for the quhilkis sextene movy of salt the said'
charlis stevin and Johne Crag sale pay ande content to the saide Dauid
Johne and Richard' the some' of thre scoir of pundis and four li' vsuale
money of scotland' within aucht dais nixt eftir It salhappin the
Saide salt to be deliuerit but ony langar delay And failyeande
tharof the saides charlis and Johne to pay thesaidis awneris and marinaris thar
daily ordinar expens' als lang as thai be vne pait Ande elikuis' gif
It salhappin the saidis awneris to failye in the deliuerance of the said' salt
ande wind and weddir seruice thane to pay the saides merchandis expens'
And to thar condicionis above writin lelely and treuly to be obseruit ande
kepit Athir of the saidis partys ar bundin and oblist' tile vtheris faitht
fully Interchangeably markit witht thar handis markis At yeir
day and place befor writin et cetera

The said day Johnne coupar was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
patry Red forspekar for the stribulance of Williame mathesoun'
and to amend as law will and forber in tyme to cum

The said day patry arthour lauchfully callit and nocht com
perit to ansuer for the stribulance of Johnne meldrummis wif
was in ane americament of the Court as day assignit to
him

Eodem die Dauid strabogy fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Willelmum
vmfray suum legittimum procuratorem actorem et factorem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam
et omnimodam potestatem ad petendum exigendum et accipiendum Instans lineatorum mensura
communionem terrarum terre sue contigne Jacente infra dictum burgum in le gastrawe
Ceteram omnia et Singula faciendum et excercendum et cetera promittens de Rato et grato

The said' day Dauid Kintor lauchfullie callit warnit and nocht comperit et cetera tile haue present
Thome of Dunbrek befor the balyeis or eliis to Ansuer' for him and pay
the thingis contenit in the actis maid' Obefor et cetera was in ane Amerciament of the court

The said' day Johne Wilyongsone offerit him redy tile do to Richerde
Rugy skippar of ane schip callit the gabriell ale that he suld' do of Resone
and tile vndirlie the law the law befor the aldirman and balyeis his Jugis ordinar
in ale thingis that the said' skippar' hed' to say tile him

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene' Tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxvj die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

head.add: Curatj Andree caidiow et Walterj cadiow

div.p:
Eodem die Andreas cadiow et Walterus caidiow filij quondam magistri
Andree caidiow elegerunt fererunt constituerunt nominarunt et ordinarunt
honorabilem virum Johannem Rutherfurd' militem suum verum legittimum Indubitatem
curatam Irreuocabilem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam Integram
potestatem Irreuocabilem Et mandatum speciale p se sua bona possessiones et
terras regendum educandum et gubernandum donec perueneruit ad etatem
perfectam secundum leges et Jura Regnj Ac Cum bonis suis terris et
possessionibus quibuscumque Intromittendum easdem petendum exigendum et Reci
piendum de receptis acquitandum Cum non petendum detinens
vero coram quocumque Judice seu Judicibus competentibus pluribus aut vno
Citandum vocandum prosequendum agendum defendendum et cetera Promittens de
Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

Eodem die Duncanus symsone amerciatur per assisam confessionem
lingue proprie pro perturbio Andree mathesoun' Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt

The said day the bailyes assignit friday that nixt cummis to
Androw murray to preiwe the study his that meg litstar has
distressit for hir maill et cetera

The said day the counsale ordanit mariory fathe to cum one sonday that
nixt cumis in tyme of the hiemes in the queyr befor the curat and
the pepill present and oppinlie mak faitht be hir greit aitht that sche
kennis the langage and eueill Rehers' quhilkis sche maid one
one besse blinseill was nocht trew nor hed' na werite and' sche
sale tak ane candill of the hee altir and Offir to the samyn
baitht the said partiis beand oblist to stand and abid' at the said'
deliuerance et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvij die
Septembris Anno quo supra

The said day Comperit mavnys skipper and follovit Dauid
blinseill be ane obligacioun' for ane barrell of Salmond girssillis
quhilk Dauid Comperit ande deponit be his aitht that his fadir
causit hyme to writ that obligacioun' and his fadir was bindin
and held' vp his hand to the said skipper to pay hyme the said
barrell of gyrssillis quhilkis suld' haue pait for Ninian
blinseill his brodir And' als' the said Dauid allegeit that it was
his fadiris det and suld' haue ben' pait for the said Ninian
and he suld' nocht pay It quhilkis the said Dauid deponit befor thir
witnes Johnne of Ratre Dauy fynne cristy prat Willeame
nicholsone Willeame blinseill couper Androw mortymer and
Willeame scrimgeor sergeand' vppoun' the quhilkis the said
skipper desyrit certificacioun'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem penultimo die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

Eodem die thomas loremar conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam
ex ore Willelmi Wormet prelocutoris eiusdem Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt pro perturbio Isabelle gerdane Et si
perturbauerit illam vel aliquem alium temporum futurum quod absit
soluit x s' fabrice ecclesie si Inde conuictus fuerit
